citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The licensee does not have a written program of veterinary care that includes the vaccination and deworming schedule
approved by the attending veterinarian. The licensee stated she does give vaccines and deworms the animals. There are
also no written instructions on regularly scheduled visits by the attending veterinarian to the facility.
Without a written program of veterinary care the inspector cannot determine if the licensee is following veterinary
recommendations for routine veterinary care. Regularly scheduled are required as determined by the attending
veterinarians so that they can oversee all aspects of veterinary care and animal care and use.
Each dealer and exhibitor shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In the case of a part-time
attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary
care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the dealer or exhibitor.
To be corrected by August 16, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The licensee does not have a written program of veterinary care that includes the vaccination and deworming schedule

Each dealer and exhibitor shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In the case of a part-time
